title: Huan Hua - Spirit Vegetarian Cottage
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Chinese, Take-out, Taiwanese
description: 浣花草堂 operates several outlets in Taiwan; this one is in the Zouying Global Mall on the 3rd floor, by Kaohsiung Zuoying Station, at 高雄市左營區站前北路1號3F. Offers lots of hot dishes including hot pot and pasta. Has afternoon tea. Will give you an English menu if you need. Comfortable, fine atmosphere decorated in a traditional Taiwanese style.
